dct:title.value: Entomopathogenicity of Beauveria bassiana (Balsamo) Vuillemin against Hyadaphis coriandri (Das)

bibo:abstract.value: The studies revealed that, the cumulative corrected mortality (CCM) ranged from 22.8-45.5 % at 24 hrs and 58.4-90.9% on 7th DAT. The mortality in treated aphids increased with increase in conidial spore concentration. While, the LC50 and LT50 were found to be 1.7 X 106 spores/ml and 69.15- 147.82 hrs. respectively, with achieving 50 % mortality of H. coriandri at 69.15 hrs with dose of 1X 1010 spores/ml. Median lethal time (LT50) values were found to be inversely proportional to the spore concentration of Beauveria bassiana.
